授業目的: The purpose of this course is to improve students’ communication skills in English. The main goal will be to develop and improve English speaking and listening skills. However, there will also be reading and writing skills development as used in communication. Students will develop their confidence to communicate in English in different situations. Weekly lessons will be about topics and skills used in different types of English communication. Students will think critically about topics from different points of view. Classroom activities will require students to work individually (alone) and collaboratively (working with others) with classmates. The main communication task will be to plan, organize, and do a poster presentation in English.
到達目標:
• Students will improve their overall English communication skills.
• Students will improve their skills and confidence to communicate in English in different situations.
• Students will improve their skills and confidence to communicate about a variety of interesting topics in English.
• Students will improve their spoken English fluency (speaking smoothly / naturally).
• Students will improve their English speaking and listening skills needed for communication.
• Students will improve their reading and writing skills needed for communication.
• Students will improve their grammar and vocabulary needed for communication.
• Students will improve their ability to work and learn with others (collaboratively).
• Students will improve their critical thinking skills.
• Students will improve their cultural knowledge by looking at topics from different points of view.
• Students will develop the skills to plan, organize, and do a poster presentation. This will be a collaborative (working with others) communication task.
特記事項:
本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。
The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.
授業方法:
Course will be face-to-face format.
Students will be required to complete work individually and collaboratively during class time, as well as completing homework outside of class time.
